description:
This is a starter course that will teach you how to get started with collecting lego minifigures and sets & how to spot fakes. Also will challenge you how to create your own custom legos using simple easy to find pieces.

This class will also present to you what sets you should buy if you considering becoming lego collector. Emphasis would be which sets to buy that will potentially double in price once they officially get retired as sets by LEGO.

This is a FREE course the full feature courses cover hours of education mixed with entertainment and a lot more lessons, extensive guide on how to choose sets to invest in and what to look for, 15 extra custom creations unique sets that I created myself using simple parts and up to 4 levels of challenge.

Guide to investing in Lego sets starter kit

Create awesome custom sets with legos

Learn what sets & minifigures to collect

Learn how to spot fake lego minifigures

title: Lego Investing: mini version of full course on legovesting
